name: Powershell Exec, Windows x64 Command Shell, Bind TCP Stager with UUID Support (Windows x64)
author: Spencer McIntyre

description:
Execute an x64 payload from a command via PowerShell.

Spawn a piped command shell (Windows x64) (staged).

Listen for a connection with UUID Support (Windows x64)
